ADDENDUM
TO AVSEC CIRCULAR
NO. 04/2017
Subject: Dispensing with Stamping of Hand Baggage Tags
After successful trial run and positive feedback received from the concerned
quarters, it has been decided to dispense with the present system of stamping of Hand
Baggage Tags by ASGI APSU at Pre-Embarkation
Security Check (PESC) points at
six additional airports, namely Chennai, Patna, Lucknow,
Guwahati, Jaipur and
Trivandrum with immediate effect.
2.
The airport operator shall ensure that the requisite monitoring system and
supporting infrastructure are maintained all through at PESC points.
3.
AVSEC Order No. 2/2000,
AVSEC Circular No. 03/2015,
NCASP Para No.
7.1.3.1 &7.1.3.3 and other related instructions on the subject stand partially amended
to that extent with respect to the aforementioned airports.
4.
This issues with the approval of Director General, BCAS.
